java_service:
[Unit]
Description=Java Collector Service
After=network.target

[Service]
ExecStart=/usr/bin/java -jar {{.JarPath}} --host {{.Host}} --connection-key {{.ConnectionKey}}

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target
executable_service:
[Unit]
Description=Executable Collector Service
After=network.target

[Service]
ExecStart={{.ExecutablePath}} --host {{.Host}} --connection-key {{.ConnectionKey}}

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target
